title: Connection Issues?
body: Yesterday, as I logged into League, everything was fine until I got to the page where you can choose whether to 5v5, Co-op VS AI, etc. When I got there, a message popped up saying "Servers are unavailable at this moment". Is it because the NA servers were actually down, or is it that I changed the internet modem I used, therefore effecting my server IP pathing? Thanks in advance.

replies.body: I'm not seeing any widespread NA server issues around the time you posted this, so I'm wondering if that was in fact related to the new modem settings or something. Check out the [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) and give your router/modem a good reset and let me know if you're still having problems!
